game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: Legend says the artifact has incredible power. Locate it and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare magic scroll

task.description: Search the ancient ruins for any clues leading to the artifact's location.
A powerful spirit guards the artifact. Defeat it to claim the artifact.
